reviews.review_msg: Doug's exams are super super tough. I'm usually an A student and I ended up with a C+ in his course. However, the way he teaches the material gives you a totally different outlook on life and economics. I actually really enjoyed the material and the way he taught it, but wouldn't recommend his course if you want a good grade.

Can't hear what she says during the lecture,eventhough I was sitting in the front. Mid term was not so difficult but final exam was tricky. I got F which was totally unexpected and I was shocked! I got 70% for mid and I study hard for final which was I thought I did ok.Lots of student bombed in this course!!
She is very nice but Final Exam was very difficult.
keep repeating stuff on the text. basically u will do good if u keep up with the text, but i hate his grading method.
